title: Cooking Light Soups & Stews Cookbook
description: Delicious, satisfying soups and stews are destined to become family favorites with this beautiful volume. Over 150 kitchen-tested recipes include hearty stews, chilies, gumbos, jambalayas plus dozens of other one-dish meals. Cooking Light Soups and Stews incorporates easy-to-find ingredients, basic cooking instructions, and stocks and broths bursting with homemade flavors.
author: Cooking Light
